name: Dance Princess Gwendolyn
description:
A game for The Pacifist Jam(Honest Jam IV)

You are Dance Princess Gwendolyn!

Yer goal it to become the DANCE QUEEN!

Have dance offs with rivals from 6 different dance styles!

Defeat the champions of the 6 styles!

Accessorize to make yer dancing more effective!

Don't forget to pack some Snax!

Eventually work yer way up to challenge the Dance Queen, and acquire her Diamond Tiara!

Put on the Tiara, and WIN THE GAME!
